column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////this place is super delicious but expect to have circle the tiny parking lot to find no parking and then circle around the block to find street parking
column2: and then wait in a pretty good sized line when you finally get in. even though I really don't like crowded places
column3: its hard for me to stay away. the entire bakery is pretty cramped. its not a very big place so I suppose they are trying to maximize seating.
